TestDescription.name: Ruby on Rails database configuration file
TestDescription.Description: Ruby on Rails applications store database configuration information in a file named [bold]config/database.yml[/bold]. By default it contains three configurations: production, development, and test. The information stored in this file is highly sensitive and should not be found in a production system.
TestDescription.Impact: Sensitive information disclosure. An attacker can use this information to conduct further attacks.
TestDescription.Recommendation: Restrict access to this file or remove it from the system.
